TextBlock.Text: Components: Central chamber capable of handling large amounts of energy, and 1 prototype warp core. Components: 3 modules connected to central chamber, with double-size gravity cannon attached to front of central module.
This warp core will allow us to gather valuable data for the continued development of the advanced warp core.
The chamber will need to be equipped with a new projection pool and projection wall to facilitate swift communication of information within the station.
Crafting of new projection stones is to be conveyed to Daz at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop.</color>
CASSAVA: I shall be returning to Statue Island soon. I would be happy to convey this message to the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> during my visit!
PRIVET: Of course you will. Send Daz my regards, Cassava!
